website_summaries.verdict: This scrubber mat gives you scrubbing action on the top and sides, and you don't even have to bolt it down.
pros: Built-in shoe sole and edge brushes
Easy to place by the entrance
No need to bolt it down – your body weight keeps in place
cons: Side brushes do not reach high up on boots

customer_reviews.title: Item received is not as described
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to be all weather resistant high density molded plastic, butthe product is made of cheap wood. The picture and description shows the plastic, but the product received had wood, which will not hold up with constant wet conditions. Contacted the company, but have not had any reply.The one picture is from the site and the other is the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanus

customer_reviews.title: Close, but no cigar.
customer_reviews.text: Boots have treds that have grooves that run in multiple directions. You need to be able to scrub your boot soles fore and aft, side to side, in a twisting motion, etc in order to get the mud out of all the treds.This device restricts your foot to pretty much forward, backward scrubbing action. I'll keep it, because I need something (and this is better than nothing. But will continue my search for a scrubber that works better). And, by the way, every other boot scrubber I have found on the market has this same fundamental shortcoming. You need to be able to freely scrub your boot sole from side to side, and diagonally.
customer_reviews.author: GScott

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works not-so-good
customer_reviews.text: Got this to try and keep the construction mud & sand out of the house. So far I've used it 2 days, and it isn't helping that much. Put it on a mat outside, stand on it, and wipe my feet back and forth. Works okay if I do this for 3-4 minutes NON-STOP on each foot. BUT! It gets better! The side brushes aren't high enough to clean out the welts. I still have to balance on one foot while I'm trying to brush off the other with a hand brush, so in the end I'm still doing what I was doing after I stand on this for almost 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Fuel683

customer_reviews.title: Momma Don't Play
customer_reviews.text: Momma screamed "take off dem shoes" Cuz scrubbin da rug gives Momma da Blues. One day she whooped me with a switch Now when my shoes are dirty it makes me twitch. I bought these here scrubbers for front porch and back Now momma won't whoop me but she still keeps me on track Who'd a thunk these boot brushes would save my young keester. Glad I got em at Christmas instead of at Easter.
customer_reviews.author: BeirutVet

customer_reviews.title: If I could only give it zero stars
customer_reviews.text: I could not try the product out because it came with 3 huge cracks from shipping making it unusable...tried to return it, but it is an un-returnable product. I should have looked harder when I purchase the product to see if I could return it when damaged. I would think it being a prime product that I could return it and get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS - GREAT DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: only used it a couple times but seems to be well-made and sturdy... stand on it with both feet and simply alternate moving your feet forward and backward and your feet roll across the rollers and the brushes clean the bottoms and sides... although since my shoes are frequently caked with thick mud on the bottoms and sides i place the boot-scrubber in a shallow (5" deep) plastic pan (big enough for my feet to have room going forwards and backwards - bought at Lowes to mix cement in for about $6.00) and add enough water in the bottom of pan to cover the brushes and that helps loosen the mud for the brushes to do their job...
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily, barely ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good that its wide if you have nice boots and don't want to scrap the sides very hard like other tight scrapers, if just the bottoms. The bristles on the bottom are just a bit too short and the round dowels on each end break very easily, we purchased three, after 1 week the dowels broke. Looks like wood black sides, its actually plastic and hard to mount on a piece of meaty wood to keep it stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got
customer_reviews.text: Working well now for the summer. Got this when I was out in the mud a fair amount building a stone wall and wanted to stop tracking in dirt. Put by the back door and stand on one side while you scrape the other. Nice to have the brushes at the bottom and side - hadn't realized that I needed those side brushes until I used them. I would have somehow liked something a bit more industrial - the wood dowels make me nervous. But so far so good. When dirt accumulates under you can just pick it up and sweep the dirt away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well not do durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and helped a huge amount. Used this at hunting camp with horse and mud junk. Made a big difference in keeping tent carpet clean. Not as durable as needed and started to loose bristles after less than 5 days. Needs a base board to stand on while cleaning one shoe instead of standing on the other side. Works and will keep using until worn out, but will upgrade when its done,.
customer_reviews.author: Reel-Lentless

customer_reviews.title: To make matters worse, there are 18 staples on the underside that ...
customer_reviews.text: Because the side brushes are level with the "bottom" brushes, they will not clean the side of your shoes or boots at all. To make matters worse, there are 18 staples on the underside that hold rubber strips to the plastic frame. Because the staples all protrude from the rubber, the staples would all be in contact with my wooden porch. If I were to use this scrubber brush, my porch deck would quickly be in ruins. AVOID!.
customer_reviews.author: esetter

customer_reviews.title: Buying this was a mistake
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Doesn't stay put when you try to use. Apparently, I can't return it, regardless of condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First step on it broke a dowel rod. 150lb female. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many such products, it doesn't have overly wiry brushes that attack the leather all the way up the last. Those products have their place, but I mainly am taking a bit of mud and dust off the bottom of polished shoes and boots. most also require permanent mounting. This one has three tacky strips that keep it from moving around, but having two boot channels your own body weight standing on it with two feet is what holds it in place. It is also easier to clean than similar models with coir material on them.
customer_reviews.author: Deadeye

customer_reviews.title: Best Boot/Sneaker Cleaner! The Toughest!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. Plastic doesn't really sound tough. And I've used other plastic ones that sucked. This one is very well built and very sturdy. Easy to use and works on anything you throw at it. Mud, dog crap, snow, ice, etc. I have purchased 9 different boot cleaners on Amazon and 6 on eBay and this is the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Too small to remove much mud
customer_reviews.text: You have to stand on this thing to keep it from moving as you brush mud from your shows and it definitely bows under your weight. The brushes are small and don't reach far up the side of your shoes, so 1) it can't reach all the mud on your shoes if they are really caked, and 2) the device is overwhelmed by even a small amount of mud and can't clean your shoes any further. I don't find it effective when I really need it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look like the picture. It has a raw wood frame. Broke within 2 uses because the wood is not much thicker than a pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Jeffcoat

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe/boot scrubber
customer_reviews.text: Farm life means lots of mud, dirt and animal pucky! We clean off as much as we can before we get to the house and then use this to help clean out the treads on our shoes. Not perfect, but what is? It is still one of the most helpful for cleaning the bottom of our shoes prior to going into the porch. We have had this for several months and so far we are quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace wooden scrubber which had finally deteriorated. I like this one because it has plastic rails, but I don't understand why they didn't use PVC dowels. If the wooden dowels bow or split, I'll disassemble and replace them myself. Seems very sturdy after using it on two camping trips to scrub shoes before going in to the trailer. It helps keep the dirt tracked in to a minimum. May buy another to keep in trailer. so I can leave this one at the back door at home.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: Side brushes are too low!
customer_reviews.text: This boot scrubber does an ok job at removing snow from the bottoms of your shoes. I haven’t tried it on muddy shoes yet, but I’m thinking it would have the same effect. The bristles on the sides are evenly leveled with the bottom bristles. It makes no sense to me why it’s made that way. They’re way too low to do any good in scrubbing off debris from the side of your boots and shoes. Thus giving this just a 3 star. Item is ok, not great. I’ve posted a short video and a few photos showing just how low those side bristles are. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this one!
customer_reviews.text: Since it's not bolted to the ground, you have to keep one foot on the unit while cleaning the other. Which standing on wobbly bristles with a bad back isn't too pleasant. Otherwise, it's great! I'm a gardener (with a bad back) and my nephew (who lives with me) is a professional landscaper. So we've done some real testing on it, daily, for almost three months. Couldn't be happier with it, especially at that price, to not hear complaints about mud being all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: PublicName

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We live at the beach. Sand is ever-present in our home. I purchased this boot-scrubber as a way to leave more of the sand at the door than on the floor. That I can stand on it with both feet, and thus one foot stabilizes while the other foot scrubs away the sand is the easiest! I placed it on a mat, so every once in awhile I can tip the scrubber, tap the sand out onto the mat and tap the sand from the mat into a dustpan for easy disposal. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Savage

customer_reviews.title: Really Cleans !
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer for wildlife rehabilitation and must go in muddy areas and areas thick with brush and who knows what else. My boot soles get caked with all kinds of "stuff" and then would get tracked into the house. That was until I purchased this mat. I actually purchased 2. One for home and one for the rehab center. It works GREAT! Takes all the "stuff" off my boots and I now do not track anything into the center or my house. If you are thinking about this product - do not hesitate to purchase. I highly recommend it. I am going to purchase more for every door at the rehab center.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and effective. You must stand on top of this and I am a hefty guy and it holds my weight. Plenty wide enough to accommodate my size 13 boots. The frame is made out of unfinished wooden dowels and my deteriorate if left out in the rain and hot sun. Would recommend keeping inside or somewhere that is covered from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hollon

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot Brush, But Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: The boot scrubber works well, but it is made from lightweight plastic so it moves around easily while you are using it. In order for it to remain still, you must stand on the scrubber with one foot while scrubbing the other. It works well, I just wish it was heavier so that it would remain in one place on its own while using it.
customer_reviews.author: WH6FQE

customer_reviews.title: Ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: My new jobsite boot scrubber sure does a great job at cleaning my muddy sneakers.I put it next to my back door in my garage so i can get the mud off before stepping into my home. It works really well and is easy to hose off and clean.
customer_reviews.author: scott h bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lower Mud Levels
customer_reviews.text: Work very well for mud that's lower on the shoes. If you have much up the sides it's a little hard to clean off with these bristles. But, the quality of workmanship and sturdy feel of this little gem more than make up for it. I ordered a second one, so have one for the front and back door now. Love how you can hold one side gently with your toes and scrub off the other shoe bottom, then switch to the other foot. May need to order another style for those really muddy days, or just stick with wearing mucking boots and removing them before coming in the house!
customer_reviews.author: 505HandyGal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Where I live, we don't have many sidewalks. I end up walking my dog in very, VERY dirty places, and no matter how much I wiped or stomped, my shoes & boots end up soon dirty. And my entrance is a ridiculous funnel neck, so it's kinda hard to just take off the shoes right away. So glad I got this! One tip- I originally put right by the door. My door became the recipient of sprays of mud. So, if you have the ability, put further away (I have deep steps, so I put a step down)
customer_reviews.author: SlapHappy

customer_reviews.title: very good scrubber. You step on it with one foot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very, very good scrubber. You step on it with one foot while cleaning another, easy task. Lightweight, this makes it convenient to move from place to place. Now it's already time to clean it, I guess hosing will take care of it (with water pressure).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew k.

customer_reviews.title: Clean your feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quit tracking dirt & mud in the house!!! We live on a farm, so product like this is a must. Had to get a new one as my old wooden one had rotted out. This one is made of good quality plastic of some sort, doubt will wear out during my lifetime. Like the added bristles on the sides, Old one did not have those. Purchased the matching boot puller, which is awesome also. :)
customer_reviews.author: Viki S.

customer_reviews.title: It works ok.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to do a decent job, The reason I only gave it 3 stars, is because, the bristles on the sides are level with the bristles on the bottom, which means the don't really do anything. I thought they would be raised up a bit to clean the sides of my soles. This is not the case. They are almost detrimental to the cleaning process. Have you tried using the "side" of a brush?
customer_reviews.author: lairbear

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken and attempts to return it were unsuccessful due to “no return policy”. Ultimately, it appeared to be made of cheap plastic and could not even make it through shipping before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Seasoul

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and effective, but could be better...
customer_reviews.text: Over-all I think this is the best one I've found, especially for the money. If I were to redesign it, I would put the side brushes about an half inch higher and a inch thicker. That would make it more effective at brushing the sides of your foot. But it works great for the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyDoc

customer_reviews.title: Sandy soil!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my house the previous owners left a similar version, but it had a wooden frame and sometimes left rust marks on the concrete. But it worked to keep sand out of the house so I searched for a new one. And this is the one that I ordered. It has solved all my previous issues. It's been out for an entire winter...on an open deck and a covered front porch. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, sturdy, and works great. I'll buy another one or two and give it 5 stars if you make one with taller side brushes. This is designed for sneakers or dress shoes, but is lacking when it comes to work boots. It has no flaws that I have found other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gouge

customer_reviews.title: Gets lot of Dirt off your shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. It's made of plastic so it is easy to hose off and I don't need to worry about it rotting in the rain. Easy to hold down with one foot. I was impressed with how much dirt it got off my shoes. Considering purchasing another one for the front door.
customer_reviews.author: TWATKINS

customer_reviews.title: NOT eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: When I finally opened the package to use this, I noticed that the bottom base plastic is cracked thereby weakening the entire unit, but it shows that this item is not eligible bor return. what a shame they do not stand by their products
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to clean your shoes
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This was the best creation when it comes to cleaning your shoes, boots etc. I live in the desert and I don't like the feeling of grit on the bottom of my shoes. This product is very sturdy and picks up every inch of dirt on the bottom of your shoe. It's easy to clean as well. I'm stoked! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G. Mcthune

customer_reviews.title: Weak durability
customer_reviews.text: Wooden so easily breaks if heavy pressure applied. While in use one of the under wooden suppodt broke making the entire platform unstable. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: O.W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: What will half inch wooden rods do when elivated and you step on them?
customer_reviews.text: It's got wooden cross rods, elevated off the ground, and naturally your foot steps on them and breaks them. The wooden rods support the frame. Once the rods break, the frame falls apart. For crying out loud, couldn't have you use some thick wall aluminum, or even rebar? Great concept, bad execution.
customer_reviews.author: Artanis Regnis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It works as advertised. I use every time I enter the house to clean any debris off the bottom of my shoes. No need to nail this item to a board. You just step on one side with one shoe and then clean the other shoe. Highly recommended if you have to walk on dirt or grass before entering the door. Also good for taking snow off the shoes. Much better than any door mat.
customer_reviews.author: Bear L.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle workers
customer_reviews.text: I work in a concrete plant. We were having issues with the front office becoming dirty/muddy from all the plant employees trecking through. We got one of these for each entrance and have noticed a world of difference in office cleanliness. I would say if these do the trick for our guys' dirty boots they would work for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Alex / Taylor

customer_reviews.title: works ok if used properly
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price but the side brushes should be a little taller IMO . I am 280 lbs and smart enough not to stand on the brush while using this I place a slight pressure on the brush just to hold it in place while cleaning the opposite shoe
customer_reviews.author: Zmann

customer_reviews.title: Good at what it was designed for.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to remove mud/debris from boots and shoes. We use it at hunt cabin to keep the interior clean. We attached it to the deck via tight fitting wooden slats on all 4 sides. This prevents lateral movement when scrubbing boots but allows the brush to be removed straight up and stored out of the sun. Hoping this significantly prolongs it's life.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing we ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT! It's absolutely useless. Wiggles around so doesn't let you really wipe your feet. If you are lucky enough to have it stay still long enough to scrape some gunk it gets full of the gunk which you then have to dig out of the bristles by hand. And it's not available for return so you're stuck with it, literally.
customer_reviews.author: garden lady

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Works well at getting the dirt off my shoes & love that I can step on one side & scrape off the other - provides better stability. So far the only complaint I have is that it's too intriguing for the dog so she keeps stealing it! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and made to last!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot/ shoe scrubber. It's very sturdy and actually does what it's supposed to. Its perfect for mud and really get everything off my shoes after being in the chicken coop. I highly recommend this boot scrubber.
customer_reviews.author: SuzTru

customer_reviews.title: Great boot/shoe scraper
customer_reviews.text: We've been through many boot scrapers, and so far, this is by far the best. We have chickens - so, enough said! This scraper cleans well - no more tracking poo! We've only had it a week or so, but right now, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Great value & does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: This simple boot scrubber works well, needs no installation, and is a great value. I live in the Pacific Northwest and have ample opportunity to get needles and gunk on the bottom and sides of my shoes. This scrubber removes the junk. The unit stays put if you stand on it with both feet. It moves a bit if you stand on it one foot at a time. Finally, clean hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.author: carolanne

customer_reviews.title: Works BETTER than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: No more dirty shoes into the house! I'm a pretty large guy, and this thing holds up good. Nice and sturdy and the bristles are firm enough to get all the bottoms and sides. Will buy more for all the entrances of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Big Country

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of keeping dirt outside.
customer_reviews.text: Great little boot/shoe scrubber. Nice that it doesn't need to be secured to function as it is cleverly designed to use your body weight to hold it in place. Seems well made and sturdy. Recommend you place it somewhere easy to sweep as all the dirt that is removed from your shoes falls below...and stays outside. Pleased with its low profile appearance, too.
customer_reviews.author: consumeless

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and It does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it in my mudroom at home. It seems well made and does a good job cleaning my muddy boot soles. I'm 200 lbs and wear a size 11 boot. I'm happy with it and it's priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I read a couple of reviews stating that the item they received was made of wood not molded plastic as shown. The item I received was made of molded plastic and looked exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Cut to the Chase

customer_reviews.title: Much better than cocoa fiber mats
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a cocoa fiber with coiled spring. This will undoubtedly last much longer and won’t deteriorate in the hot/wet Florida weather. Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for cleaning off flip-flops or shoes that might pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but keep in mind the side bristles are not very high to get the side of your boots. This is perfect for cleaning off flip-flops or shoes that might pull off your feet if the bristles on the sides where higher
customer_reviews.author: The Kelley's Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN YOUR SHOES TOO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very =effective cleaner of the soles of your shoes as you enter the house. Let’s keep all our surroundings clean in the days of the spreading of disease!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it will hold up. It’s not as natural as I thought it would be to keep both feet together. I put mine near and handrail right outside my chicken coop. It so far has worked well. My concern about side brushes not being high enough. Today was pretty muddy and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: bmansc

customer_reviews.title: Good for light duty when screwed down
customer_reviews.text: Screws that assemble this are a bit weak. Good for light use, could benefit from better joinery. Needs to be screwed down to something. Other than that, it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed..........
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this boot scrubber for a couple months now and I have to say that I'm pretty impressed. When I took the scrubber out of the box, I was very skeptical of the plastic it was made of. I figured this would last a week at best. To my surprise, it's very sturdy and can take some abuse. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Best damn boot/shoe cleaner money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: If you have feet and wear shoes, you owe it to yourself to have one at the front and back doors. These are amazing! They clean the bottom and sides of your shoes, they are EASY to clean, pick them up and shake them and you are done. Just plain work, tough as nails.
customer_reviews.author: 7SFCW4

customer_reviews.title: good, but you may want a piece of carpet under it.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it supposed to do, it's just that it slide around a bit. You either need a piece of scrap carpet under it to help with the sliding or hold onto it with one boot while scrubbing the boot on the other foot.
customer_reviews.author: david s

customer_reviews.title: Cleans muddy boots well
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bristles do a very good job on my boots and shoes. I need to figure out how to anchor it so I don't have to try to hold it secure with one foot while cleaning the other.
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Worked great to clean my golf shoes. Does the job better than the more expensive shoe cleaner at my golf club. I liked so much I bought another one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: xabv04

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place well.
customer_reviews.text: It just sorta slides around on the concrete. Disappointing. Nothing to stand on to hold it in place when cleaning the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tech.Tennis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a previous one with a wood base that fell apart. This one does the job and I'm sure will hold up much better in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Terria527

customer_reviews.title: Works well in South Florida
customer_reviews.text: I was always tracking bits of dirt and sand into the house. With this mat, a few scrapes back and forth and the problem goes away. I do not know how well it works on mud, because in South Florida we really don't have the kind of mud I recall we had in PA. But for my situation, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: E D

customer_reviews.title: The scrubbers are easily cleaned with a spray from the hose
customer_reviews.text: Having a wet spring here on the farm with lots of clay soil exposed, the boot scrubber is essential. It scrapes the bottom as well as the sides of my boots. It works well as long as the mud is not too high up, as the scrubbers are low. The scrubbers are easily cleaned with a spray from the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My Husband likes this very much
customer_reviews.text: exactly what he was looking for to clean shoes after working in the yard. easy to use, effective and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Clement

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This boot scrubber works great and is easy to use. We are so impressed by the quality of first one that we ordered a second one for a different location.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before and really like them, but they may not be the best choice for HD boots with large lug soles. Work great for shoes, light hiking boots, etc.
customer_reviews.author: FlyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I have a sandy yard. These are a life saver. Helps keep sand in yard a not my house. Gets dirt out of crevices of shoes. Better than a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: You will be glad to have this.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I'm keeping it on our porch so we don't bring dirt and grass into the house. It's awesome! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bower

customer_reviews.title: Works well, does good job cleaning shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does good job cleaning shoes. Put by side door to use after gardening. Gets shoes relatively clean.
customer_reviews.author: AlStuff

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that it slides along my deck when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Bristles are stiff enough to get dirt off boots. The only thing I don't like is that it slides along my deck when I try to clean my boots. I have to keep my other foot on the corner to keep it in place. Maybe a different anti-slip material would be a good upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans mud from boots and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Rubber feet keeps it in place when in use. Brushes included for horizontal and vertical surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Buster Thinks

customer_reviews.title: If you aren’t comfortable standing on once side and scraping your foot on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on dirt/dust - waiting to see how it works with mud. If you aren’t comfortable standing on once side and scraping your foot on the other (it’s actually really easy to do) you can place the scraper near a wall so while you scrape your shoes you can lean against the wall for additional support.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe scrapes ever
customer_reviews.text: This work great to clean shoes. The bristles brushes work better than other types.
customer_reviews.author: Billy R. Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Best little foot scrubber for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: This little scrubber will do the job and it's super tough and durable! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Carfi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The side brushes get shoes clean in an area that a regular door mat would never get to. Someone reviewed that it was too light so it moved when using. I don't understand as there are two sections - one for each foot. Your own weight holds it in place.
customer_reviews.author: MarkDS

customer_reviews.title: Does a fantastic job.
customer_reviews.text: Did not dislike anything. It is a shoe or boot scraper to remove debris.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien R. Beaudet

customer_reviews.title: Boot/shoe scraper.
customer_reviews.text: This boot scraper is excellent. Live in an area with lots of sand. Does the job, sturdy and really that there is not metal like some boot scrapers. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need to shed the boot mud
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Low pro so it's not a balancing act to use it. We've used it through winter and it's not worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stand on it while using
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have size 13 and it works well. You have to put both feet on it and do one foot at a time. Some uncoordinated people may struggle with that but it is comical to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bower

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean shoes
customer_reviews.text: This product is light weight. Cleans shoes very well. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This design makes sense
customer_reviews.text: This design makes sense because the user can hold the product down with one shoe while cleaning the other. This requires no attaching to a floor, etc.
customer_reviews.author: P. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger but it does work good. Wish it came with a way to attach it to my deck, so we didn't have to stand on it with both feet to clean our shoes. Yet it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: FeelinSexi@54

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one of the natural fiber type that wore out. Does a really good job of cleaning off mud.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Gargurevich

customer_reviews.title: Every home should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. Keeps my family from tracking in dirt from the backyard. Now if I could only train my dogs to use it too!
customer_reviews.author: Cajoledn2it

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried it with thick mud and snow and it works great! The dirt comes off pretty well (nothing gets it all off except a good hosing down) and I can easily pick it up and sweep the dirt away.
customer_reviews.author: Timetoride

customer_reviews.title: Not for work boots
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t get into the grooves as well as I wanted for my boots. This works fine for everyday shoes with large grooves, but did not work for my work boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gray atlanta GA

customer_reviews.title: No return
customer_reviews.text: Be warned that if you buy it you can’t return it! I have purchased in the past and have been happy with the product in general now but literally just purchased and received 2 and 1 was broken in half on one side. Disappointed a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for using at the back door after taking the dogs out. It scrapes the mud and grass off without scratching up my shoes. It doesn’t take up much space and the construction seems like it should hold up to the elements without falling apart. It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth ot
customer_reviews.text: The brushes don’t even reach the part of my boots that have mud on it
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wide enough for shoes and boots....men and women. Can move foot around and get all sides and bottom. Just stand both feet on at once to secure the piece and then scrub away!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: gail d

customer_reviews.title: clean your boots off !
customer_reviews.text: Great for those of us that Live near or on that " red dirt road " i can't wait till they come up with a ( mat size version ) ( 20''x30'' ) so we can make this be our new mat at the side and rear doorway's. keep workin Folk's your almost their.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Scrubs off all dirt from all types of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wish it didn’t move around so easily but I have no way to solve it! I does clean our shoes very well!
customer_reviews.author: Patzi Shea

customer_reviews.title: A must if you live in the country!
customer_reviews.text: These work great if you need to take dirt and mud off your shoe. I bought one for the house and the RV. It really helps keeping the inside of your house or RV clean. I live in the country and it really works well getting dirt of your shoes before going in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Updated review; originally wrote brushes too soft. Updating after extensive use.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy but the brushes are too soft and the side brushes are very low so is not very effective Update: After using it quite a bit during the salt snow slush days I can say the brushes work well and cleans our boots well. We shall see what happens during mud season.
customer_reviews.author: Len M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but I recommend putting a better grip thing
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I recommend putting a better grip thing. On the bottom or screw it down. Was wiping my boots and dang near face planted when it spun around on me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: restaurant worker
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't remove all of the food from the bottom of my shoes but does a decent job, partly because of the type of shoes that I wear
customer_reviews.author: Arlie Turman

customer_reviews.title: Works well and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a staple outside our front door for my husband and kids alike. Works well and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Lem

product_meta.title: Jobsite Boot Scrubber Flat Mat Scraper Brush - As Seen on TV
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :11.1 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 2.16 Pounds
 * Item model number :54099
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :July 18, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Job Site
 * ASIN :B00TY2MN1O

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #250,385 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #96 inShoe Brushes 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars915 ratings
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
BEST BOOT CLEANER: As Seen On TV - Perfect cleaning tool to have by every door - Freestanding and Portable - Practical and Easy to use
LEAVE THE DIRT OUTSIDE: The built-in sole and edge brush cleans caked on snow, ice, mud, dirt and manure better than any other mats. All debris falls between roller bristles for easy cleaning.
STURDY CONSTRUCTION: Constructed with high-density molded plastic, withstands weight up to 250 pounds without bending or breaking. Three non-slip rubber grips provide stability on concrete.
LOW PROFILE: Low-profile brushes are the perfect height for cleaning sides and edges of shoes or boots without scratching them. Fits shoes up to size 13
TRUSTED BRAND: 100% Manufacturer Money Back Guarantee. Ideal for home, work, barn, ranch, beach or RV.
